name: ish
description:
A 2D multi-environmental sidescroller that attempts to convey the tension of duality in regards to race, ethnicity, and culture. The player belongs to two different worlds in which their unique abilities are rejected, they attempt to navigate the puzzles in each world in order to find a balance between each world without being overwhelmed by the pressures of both worlds.

Instructions:

  • WASD and/or arrow keys for movement. 
  • Spacebar to jump.
  • ‘F’ Push/Pull
  • ‘K’ is to teleport.
  • ‘R’ to reload to past checkpoint once dead
